channel.title: CVE Feed for PureStorage -- FlashBlade
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PureStorage -- FlashBlade

item.title: CVE-2023-4976|2024-07-17T18:03:09.461Z -- purestorage -- flashblade
item.description: A flaw exists in Purity//FB whereby a local account is permitted to authenticate to the management interface using an unintended method that allows an attacker to gain privileged access to the array.

item.title: CVE-2023-4976|2024-07-17T15:25:58.472Z -- purestorage -- flashblade
item.description: A flaw exists in Purity//FB whereby a local account is permitted to authenticate to the management interface using an unintended method that allows an attacker to gain privileged access to the array.
